pullrequest.title: Fix pkgconfig type logic for core project libraries

content.raw:
Someone with really good bash scripting skills could set up a mock project in the `examples` folder with some mock components and mock dependencies and test that the pkgconfig output matches expectations.

I don't do enough bash scripting to know if that's an easy task.
content.html:
